name: ABCO TECHNOLOGY
overview:
ABCO Technology specializes in providing training and consulting for the Information Technology Industry. Computer Training is provided by experienced, certified industry experts that have years of seasoning in their respective field of Information Technology.

ABCO Technology is a computer technology company engaged in the business of providing job training for all types of applications and software used in the real world job environment. ABCO caters to all individuals ranging from beginner level computer users to IT professionals. ABCO technologyâ€™s graduate students are prepared to take on the challenges they will face in todayâ€™s job market.

ABCOâ€™s mission is to help people succeed. We endeavor to make our students employable in the field of IT as office managers, technicians, network administrators, developers, and webmasters. The teachers of Abco Technology have a desire is to create value, earn trust, deliver results, exceed expectations, and empower people.
